mapper.select: SELECT id as id,name as name ,sex as sex ,nation as nation ,birthday as birthday, address as address , id_card as idCard,phone as phone ,relation as relation, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime, delete_status as deleteStatus, suspect_id as suspectId from visit_info vi where delete_status = 0 and vi.suspect_id = #{param.suspectId}
